detailsOfAchievement: DISHA PRATISHTHAN has a motto of Development of Homeless and Weaker Section of Society and is specialized in conducting various camps and programs for help of weaker section of society and for the rehabilitation, deaddiction and skill development of the homeless peoples. Disha has shifted around 44 homeless families from various streets of Pune to its own land of 15 R in Keshavnagar, Mundava, Pune. They are facilitated with shed, water, electricity, preprimary education and Ration card, Addhar card, Voter card, Bank Account etc. Disha believes that proper motivation, adequate training, requisite infrastructure and committed social support can convert these homeless or faceless unemployed youth in a highly achievement oriented successful skilled worker or entrepreneur.

detailsOfAchievement: Activities: 1. Implementation of projects and programmes for holistic development of socially and economically underprivileged community especially women, children and youth community members. 2. Organize cultural activities, lectures, competitions and workshops for teenagers and youths to instil values of integrity, unity and equality amongst them so as to preserve societal spirit. 3. Informal Education Programmes for education of underprivileged communities. 4. Awareness, Training & Demonstration of Participatory Pilot Projects for Environment Protection & Conservation. 5. Awareness Programmes for community especially women about their fundamental human rights. 6. Awareness Programmes on health & hygiene related issues especially for women & children. 7. Conceptualize and demonstrate pilot village development projects for responsible, appropriate and effective use of natural, human and other resources. 8. Organize Entrepreneurial Skills Development workshops with focus on Natural Resource Based Entrepreneurial activities. 9. Conceptualizing and mobilizing environment-friendly tourism, agro-tourism and undertaking pilot projects for such demonstrations. 1. Vasundhara Samruddhi (Planet Prosperity) Project: On the background of climate change, escalating pollution, water resources polluted due to chemical solid-waste, chemical fertilizers and pesticides, creek, sea, coastlines dumped with garbage mounds, global warming, destruction of hills and mountains, its necessary to preserve planets bio-diversity, which is at the root of the sustainability of life on earth. This beautiful planet is our home and if our home is on fire, we cant go downstairs and have a debate on who started the fire and who is responsible to put it out. We need to get some water and put it out. Vasundhara Samruddhi Project aims at awareness, trainings, workshops and actions for the prosperity of our own earth.
